offerings.name: Sugar Waxing
offerings.desc: natural waxing method using sugar, honey, and lemon. Offer lip, eyebrows, underarms, legs, arms, and bikini area.

offerings.name: Manicure
offerings.desc: regular polish, gel polish, or gel-extensions. Includes sugar scrub, hot towels, and 5 minute massage

offerings.name: Pedicure
offerings.desc: regular or gel polish. Includes sugar scrub, mask, hot towels, and 10 minute massage

offerings.name: Blowout / hot tool styles
offerings.desc: blow dry with a round brush that makes the hair bouncy and voluminous

offerings.name: Henna Color
offerings.desc: Henna is a natural alternative to traditional hair color, available in natural hair colors

offerings.name: Hair/scalp treatments
offerings.desc: Hair treatments provided can moisturize, add strength, or treat dry scalp depending on clients needs

offerings.name: Swedish Massage, 30 min
offerings.desc: Relaxes the body and relieves pain in muscles with slow calming strokes

offerings.name: Swedish Massage, 60 min
offerings.desc: Relaxes the body and relieves pain in muscles with slow calming strokes

offerings.name: Chair Massage, 10 min
offerings.desc: Done while sitting using compression to relieve tension
